title: Maksim Danilin (footballer, born September 2001)
text:
Maksim Alekseyevich Danilin (; born 13 September 2001) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="FC%20Spartak-2%20Moscow">FC Spartak-2 Moscow</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Spartak-2%20Moscow">FC Spartak-2 Moscow</a> on 7 July 2019 in a game against <a href="FC%20Baltika%20Kaliningrad">FC Baltika Kaliningrad</a>.
